DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: You are standing under an air shaft.
You`re inside a small cavern with an air shaft to the surface.
You`ve found an air shaft to the surface.
This is a small cavern with an air shaft to the surface.
It appears far too narrow to navigate, but the air smells sweet.
The shaft is little more than a small hole, but it`s still nice
Sweet air wafts in from the small narrow hole in the ceiling.
At first you felt quite safe here, but what is that stuff on the floor?
This place seems fairly nice, except for those odd sounds.
This must be the most refreshing cavern in this whole place, except, what was that sound?
You can`t imagine a more refreshing place in this lair to be standing in. Say, what`s that stuff on the floor?
$rats_random_blurb
$rats_leaf_exit
You are standing in (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling laboratory.
You`re inside (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling laboratory.
You`ve found (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling laboratory.
This is (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling laboratory.
Implements of alchemy, dissection, and experimentation are everywhere.
Implements of alchemy, dissection, and experimentation are all over the place.
Implements of alchemy, dissection, and experimentation are all over.
Implements of alchemy, dissection, and experimentation are scattered about.
You can already feel your safety level dropping.
This place seems downright bizarre.
This can`t be a sane place to be hanging out.
You can`t imagine a more insane spot to be standing in.
$rats_random_blurb
$nasty_rat_exit

MOB.NAME: Doctor $fantasy_name1

DISPLAY.DISPLAY: $mob_name is engaged in some troubling experiment.

MOB.DESCRIPTION: A mad scientist if you ever saw one.

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: You are standing in (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon hatchery.
You`re inside (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon hatchery.
You`ve found (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon hatchery.
This is (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon hatchery.
Large eggs are set carefully about the room.
Large eggs are evenly spaces around this room.
Large eggs are everywhere you look.
You feel quite nervous here.
This place seems like a dangerous spot for a rest.
This can`t be a safe place to be hanging around in.
You can`t imagine a more dangerous place to camp out in.
$rats_random_blurb
$rats_leaf_exit

MOB.DESCRIPTION: $mob_name is majestic, but simply being in its presence makes you uneasy.

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: You are standing in (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon`s lair.
You`re inside (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon`s lair.
You`ve found (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon`s lair.
This is (a(n)) $adj_scary_feeling dragon`s lair.
$rats_random_blurb
You don`t feel like you`ll live very long here.
This seems like a good place to die.
This can`t be a good place.
You can`t imagine a more foolish place to wait around in.
$rats_leaf_exit

MOB.DESCRIPTION: $mob_name is majestic, but simply being in its presence makes you uneasy.

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: You are standing in a dead-end.
You`re inside a dead-end cavern.
You`ve found a dead-end cavern.
This is a dead-end.
$rats_random_blurb
You feel like there`s more dead here than end.
This seems like a dead-end in more than once sense of the word.
The name of this place could not be more accurate.
You can`t imagine why this is a dead-end.
$rats_leaf_exit
You are standing in an ancient crypt.
You`re inside an ancient crypt.
You`ve found an ancient crypt.
This is a crypt.
$rats_random_blurb
You feel the $adj_mustydark shadow of death here.
The smell of $adj_mustydark decay hangs like a fog.
The $adj_mustydark aura of the afterlife has found a home here.
The cold feelings of $adj_mustydark decay have found no rest here.
$rats_leaf_exit

ITEM.NAME: an open sarcophagus
ITEM.description: It appears both ornate and extremely heavy.

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: You are standing in an empty carved stone room.
You`re inside an empty stone room.
You`ve found an empty stone room.
This is an empty stone room.
You feel perfectly safe here, and wonder why nothing has claimed this place yet?
This seems like a safe place to take a rest, so long as nothing comes through the door.
This appears to be the safest spot in this place so far. Perhaps you can take a rest and a bite, so long as nothing comes through the door.
You can`t imagine a safer place to rest, though perhaps keeping one eye open.
$rats_leaf_exit

STRING.STRING: You are standing in (a(n)) $adj_any $_rats_tunnelword that branches $roomexits_desc_long.
You stand in (a(n)) $adj_any $_rats_tunnelword that runs steeply $roomrun_desc_long.
You are in (a(n)) $adj_anynosize $_rats_tunnelword that runs narrowly $roomrun_desc_long.
The $adj_phys_nosize ceiling is lower than usual.
You hear the $adj_scary_feeling sounds of tiny pattering feet nearby.
You hear faint but $adj_scary_feeling animal sounds echoing around you.
Some $adj_scary_feeling creature obviously relieved itself here.
Bits of half-eaten trash can be seen around here.
Bits of some half-eaten creature are here.
Was that the sound of something $adj_scary_feeling?
The stinky hole you came through is to the $roomexits_desc_long.
The way out of here is $roomexits_desc_long.
The exit to the $roomexits_desc_long is the only way out.
The only way out of here is $roomexits_desc_long.

ITEM.ITEM: <ITEM class="metacraft:any-Weaponsmithing < $level_range" name="(a(n)) $adj_metal_broken $item_name" display="$item_name lies here" damage=1 attack=-10 affbehav="" /> <ITEM class="metacraft:any-Armorsmithing < $level_range" name="(a(n)) $adj_metal_broken $item_name" display="$item_name lies here" armor=0 affbehav="" /> <ITEM class="metacraft:any-MasterWeaponsmithing < $level_range" name="(a(n)) $adj_metal_broken $item_name" display="$item_name lies here" damage=1 attack=-10 affbehav="" condition="$level_range>30" /> <ITEM class="metacraft:any-MasterArmorsmithing < $level_range" name="(a(n)) $adj_metal_broken $item_name" display="$item_name lies here" armor=0 affbehav="" condition="$level_range>30" />
